eligibility: Person with Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes. Only 2A available for husband and wife, where one must be diabetic.
plan_a_details: Medical screening is a must. Covers diabetic complications from Day 1. No sublimit restrictions. Premium is lower. Higher outpatient benefits.
plan_b_details: No medical screening required, even for fresh entry aged >50. Covers diabetic complications from Day 31 (except cardiovascular, renal/ eye/ foot ulcer complications, which are covered from 13th month). Sublimit for cardio-vascular complications. Premium is higher. Slightly less outpatient benefits.
day_care: All day care procedures are covered
modern_treatments: Based on the sum insured chosen limits vary
restoration_benefit: 100% Sum insured when basic sum insured is exhausted. Can be used for non-diabetic related hospitalization only. Available in individual policies.
wellness_program: Wellness Services can be availed from our Mobile App ‘Star Power’ & Customer Portal.
cost_of_artificial_limbs: On Amputation – upto 10% of Sum Insured – if Amputation surgery claim is admitted
dialysis_expenses: Rs 1000 per sitting upto 24 months from the month of dialysis recommendation
outpatient_benefits: Rs 750 per hospitalization and Rs 1500 per policy year, Blood test cost is reimbursed
personal_accidental_cover: Death sum insured equal to health sum insured & covers accidental death
